useCase.name: View System Messages
useCase.description: User views and interacts with system messages in the app.

preconditions.precondition: The user is logged into the app.
The system messages module is loaded successfully.

successEndConditions.condition: The user successfully views and interacts with the system messages.

useCase.trigger: User opens the app and navigates to the system messages section.

mainSequence.step: App loads the system messages module.
User requests to view system messages.
System messages module retrieves and displays unread messages to the user.
User views the unread messages notification.
User clicks to view message details.
App displays the message content to the user.
